name: Desert Ruins Environment
description:
Desert Ruins Environment was made in Unity and includes the executable file if you are interested in walking around the level. For the Desert Ruins Environment, I modeled, textured, and imported these desert ruin pieces into a Unity scene. Then I touched them up with some simple lighting and post processing effects.

To run:
(For Windows Only) Download the .zip file and run the executable called "what is this".
